tidbits.title: Flame Origins
tidbits.body: Charmander's flame is said to be a fragment of an ancient volcano spirit, passed down through generations of fire-types.

tidbits.title: Tail Flame Mystery
tidbits.body: The flame on Charmander's tail burns brighter when it senses danger, serving as both a warning and a beacon for allies.

tidbits.title: Mountain Dwellers
tidbits.body: Charmander populations thrive near volcanic regions, where the geothermal activity strengthens their inner fire.

tidbits.title: Battle Evolution
tidbits.body: Through intense battles and training, Charmander develops not just physical strength but also strategic fire control abilities.

tidbits.title: Loyal Companions
tidbits.body: Charmander forms lifelong bonds with trainers, their flame serving as a symbol of unwavering loyalty and determination.
